page.title: 04REPORTING / SCHOOLS
page.content: Advertisements are usually about people wanting to sell furniture, houses and cars. Sometimes the sellers get alot of response, while others, none at all. The languages in school are French and German. All forms 1,2 and 3 take French, while German is optional in the 2 year. Schools are at Ty-Isaf(nursery and infants). Junior with infants attached are at Danygraig, Ty-Sign and Risca Town. There is a comprehensive at Ty-Sign/Rogerstone. Each school in the area give their children different subjects, but they should cover the important work_ Maths. and English. Risca Comprehensive is the only local school with a uniform, but letters concerning a uniform have been sent out from Ty-Sign Infants.
